name: Flying Car Robot Flight Drive Simulator Game 2017
name_original: Flying Car Robot Flight Drive Simulator Game 2017
description:
Flying Car Robot Simulator Takes you on a adrenaline-filled robot car experience.
Do you like transforming robot games? Maybe flying car simulators? This game is best for you!
You are the driver of a cutting-edge transforming robot car.Transform your car into a robot fly like an airplane Defeat enemies and save the humanity and be the hero of the world.

if you're excited to futuristic car games and robot games you will enjoy playing Flying Car Robot Simulator.


- Take control of an intelligent flying mech robot
- X ray weapon with unlimited ammo
- Realistic Transformations
- Dynamic Robot Combats
- Stunning Car Physics
- Realistic Flying Physics
- 5 thrilling game missions. (More coming soon)
- Realistic environment.
- Beautiful landscapes
- 3 different camera view
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
